Content.Text: Hrm, a customer? I'll be right there.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's you <MYNAME>. What brings you here
today?
I came to shop.
Just stopping by.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Really? That's perfect! Y'see, I was just about to
head on down to the clinic for a checkup.
Would you mind watching the shop for me?
Sure thing!
Sorry, I'm busy.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great! I'll be back in an hour or so. Keep a close
eye on things, and don't sweat it. You'll do fine.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hrm...Now where did I put my glasses?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, right. I'm wearing them.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Y-you there! What are you doing in here?!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Sneaking into my shop while I'm out, eh? Think
you can pull a fast one on ol' Otmar, you thief?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? Erm...? Oh...!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's right, now I remember.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I asked you to watch the shop for me, didn't I?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry 'bout that! Seems like lately, I've had a
harder time than normal remembering things.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, now that I'm back, you're all done
here.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks for watching the shop for me. Here, take
this. Just a little way to say thank-you.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'll be seeing you, then. Don't be a stranger, now!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, by the way... What's your name again?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well?
